infotexts.entitydescription.ForceANature: Any outdoorsman will tell you the most frustrating part of hunting is when a crawler simply FALLS DOWN when shot, and doesn't FLY BACK DOWN into the abyss. Those days are over. Anything this baby hits better PACK A LUNCH, 'cause it is going for a ride!
infotexts.entitydescription.GuillotineLauncher: They say, this cleaver was stolen from Aunt Doris herself! She would never admit it, though. Is sharper on the sharper edge
infotexts.entitydescription.HolyMackerel: Tired of people telling you what you can or cannot use as a weapon? Those days are over! This fish is PURE ACTION! Warning: it's very fishy.
infotexts.entitydescription.FanOWar: Does killing with it count as a warcrime?
infotexts.entitydescription.Winger: Will indead give you wings - whether you're the attacker, or the attacked
infotexts.entitydescription.MadmilkSep: They always say that milk does a body good. What they don't know is that we've carefully infused our milk molochs with some sweet wholesome thermonuclear radiation. Our milk tastes great and it will also give you the strength to kick ass!
infotexts.entitydescription.BonkAtomicPunch: Bonk! is fulla radiation, which as we all know is pretty great for givin' people superpowers.
infotexts.entitydescription.DirectHit: Angels don't need wings. They need rockets. This one is designed for more experienced soldiers to hit targets and not vaguely near them.
infotexts.entitydescription.CowManglerSep: A deadly device by any measure, the Cow Mangler will quantum disentangle Crawlers, Mudraptors, Humans and even Pyros!
infotexts.entitydescription.PanicAttack: It protecc, it attacc, but most importantly, it fires 10 deadly pellets per shot
infotexts.entitydescription.ConcherorSep: if fighting is sure to result in victory then you must fight sun tzu said that and i'd say he knows a little more about fighting than you do pal because he invented it!
infotexts.entitydescription.DisciplinaryAction: Which of you numbnuts let us down?
infotexts.entitydescription.Flamethrower: Crawler nest eradication or barbeque, deathmatch or fireshow, this tool is jack of all trades!
infotexts.entitydescription.FlareGun: Flamethrowers have one major issue: their range. Wanna get rid of these pesky snipers? Burn 'em
infotexts.entitydescription.DragonsFury: Throws bricks AND fire at the same time. Twice as lethal, twice as hard to use
infotexts.entitydescription.Axetinguisher: Pyros have two serious problems - their effective range and limited underwater combat options. Axetinguisher solves the former! But not just water, BUT FIRE TOO!
infotexts.entitydescription.ThermalThrust: Death from above! Rain fire from the skies!
infotexts.entitydescription.LochnLoadSep: Looking for a good way to eliminate the competition? Tired of having a weapon with a measly single barrel? Want to hit your enemies where it hurts? Now you can have all of those things and more with our latest in a long line of home-baked explosive goods!
infotexts.entitydescription.UllapoolCaber: A sober person would throw it...
infotexts.entitydescription.Eyelander: You don't kill a man by mucking about with rifles, arrows, rocks, or other long-distance rubbish. You kill him by grabbing the biggest bloody sword you can find, running up nice and close to him, and chopping the dumb bastard’s head off. Or some other limb
infotexts.entitydescription.JumperLauncher: A special no-damage stickybomb for stickybomb jumps!
infotexts.entitydescription.StickyLauncherSep: Grenades roll and bounce, it's so inconsistent! Make sure they explode where you want them, when you want them!
infotexts.entitydescription.BrassBeast: Who send all these babies to fight!? Higher damage, slower movement, dope looks
infotexts.entitydescription.Natasha: Run and hide, babies! Lower damage, applies slowness to those hit
infotexts.entitydescription.FistsOfSteel: My fists! They are made of STEEL
infotexts.entitydescription.GoldenFryingPan: I am Heavy Weapons Guy, and this is my new weapon
infotexts.entitydescription.QuickfixSep: War historians will appreciate the original medigun - still handy even though the invuln function shorted out after its first use. This one, though, is reinforced with alien tech, allowing it not to short out anymore!
infotexts.entitydescription.SolemnVow: Art lovers will cherish this bust of Hippocrates, commemorating a time when the Medic still thought doing no harm was a good idea.
infotexts.entitydescription.CrossbowSep: This thing might look like an old crossbow of before. However, it's nothing more than a regular syringe gun! Kills enemies, heals allies, isn't it a thing of beauty?
infotexts.entitydescription.BioticGrenadeLauncherS: This grenade was reverse-engineered from some alien nanobot tech first found in ruins. The substance inside is extremely volatile and burns the human skin, preventing any healing of tissues, but only if this substance was not injected beforehand, in which case it instead heals external wounds. Nanobots break down shortly after being activated though - making effects temporary
infotexts.entitydescription.DartGun: Remember when syringe guns were very bulky and heavy? They still are! This small device, though, is very compact and allows shooting small darts containing an extremely powerful dementonite-based drug to sedate those hit for a short duration. Has a light and sound indicator so you'll always know when it's ready!
infotexts.entitydescription.AWPerHand: This controversial bolt-action beaut is banned in thousands of countries, and with good reason: You could really hurt someone with this thing.
infotexts.entitydescription.Huntsman: This is gonna be a real piece of piss, you bloody fruit shop owners!
infotexts.entitydescription.CozyCamper: Steady, steady... Heals you over the duration after use, while extinguishing any flames
infotexts.entitydescription.Bushwacka: A little of the ol' 'chop-chop! Crits on targets under jarate or fan o war effects
infotexts.entitydescription.JarateLauncherSep: Heads up! Targets take increased damage while soaked in it
infotexts.entitydescription.ScoutOutfitSep: While providing zero to none protection, this outfit is very lightweight, allowing Scout to run for his life with ease!
infotexts.entitydescription.PyroOutfitSep: Some would say hiring someone with a flamethrower to kill people in underwater locations is not the brightest thing one could do... These "some" would burn brighter for sure. Has a near-unlimited oxygen supply, but worsens vision
infotexts.entitydescription.DemoOutfitSep: One crossed wire, one piece of plastic, one UEX pack, one errant twitch... And KABLOOIE!
infotexts.entitydescription.HeavyOutfitSep: Mechanized Autonomous Subnautical Heavy Armor - top tier exosuit for your everyday merk needs! Comes equipped with compact head-size-increase-inator!
infotexts.entitydescription.SniperOutfitSep: Snipin's a good job, mate! It's challengin' work, outta doors. I guarantee you'll not go hungry. 'Cause at the end of the day, long as there's two people left on Europa, someone is gonna want someone dead.
infotexts.entitydescription.MedicOutfitSep: The original Medic cape was too uncomfortable to wear after any contact with water, making it unsuitable for aquatic operations on Europa. This outfit doesn't look as good, but is still extremely badass and is also compatible with mediguns, allowing Medics to fully utilize their potentials
infotexts.entitydescription.IntelSep: We have captured the enemy intelligence!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.GuillotineBleeding: Oof oh oh oof oh ouch oof
infotexts.afflictiondescription.DeathMark: This character is taking extra damage
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Madmilk: Damage taken by this character heals the attacker
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ShieldDash: Report it to mod authors if you see this text
infotexts.afflictiondescription.EyelanderLimbs: Extra speed and max health per hit
infotexts.afflictiondescription.BrassBeastSpin: Report it to mod authors if you see this text
infotexts.afflictiondescription.NatashaSpin: Report it to mod authors if you see this text
infotexts.afflictiondescription.BioticGrenadeAntih: You cannot receive healing from overhealing
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Jarate: This character is taking extra damage
infotexts.afflictiondescription.KazotskyKick: Let us dance, gentlemen! Dance like no one's shooting at us!
